metadata.name: Capsule Flip
metadata.description: "Capsule Jump" is a motion graphic piece from the series "Men & Solids," an exploration of the relationship between men and geometric shapes. The animation depicts a man acrobatically jumping on a rotating capsule, set against a pastel-toned background. The series aims to represent a gentle future, using soft and soothing colors to convey a sense of serenity and calm. The postmodern design elements add a touch of whimsy and playfulness to the overall aesthetic. Through the use of fluid animation, "Men & Solids" series seeks to create an immersive visual experience that invites the viewer to contemplate the harmony between the human form and geometric shapes.
